name: RPGChat.2D Multiplayer game
description:
Kill never stopping Zombies in this 2D Top Down RPG Multiplayer games that have a unique in game Chat system.

In this Role Playing Games named RPGChat,you must collect coins to buy avatars that can actually defend themselves !

RPGChat is a simple 2D Multiplayer game in Top Down perspective.

It have a RPG feel and the chat system also give the idea of a Role Playing games.

RPGChat can quickly become a deathmatch type of game when friends or avatars kill each other for their coins in this Shooter games !

Features :

Few maps populated with Zombies,enemies and coins.Even soccer balls!

RPG Chat system

2D Shooter game

Multiplayer game

Top Down

Role Playing game

So why download other Shooter games ?

Go out there and slay some Zombies !
